title: Exxon Mobil investors frustrated by slow progress
text:
Exxon Mobil investors frustrated by slow progress 11:00am GMT - 01:51 
Exxon Mobil shareholders are none too pleased with the stock's lackluster performance compared to its rivals and the oil giant's inability to get more oil out on the market at a time when prices are on the rise. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Exxon Mobil shareholders are none too pleased with the stock's lackluster performance compared to its rivals and the oil giant's inability to get more oil out on the market at a time when prices are on the rise.
